p: The prevalence of HFMD with semi-annual peaks in Guangxi was consistent with that of other southern Chinese provinces [ 16]; specifically, a major peak was observed from April to August, and another peak occurred from September to November. The summit of the major peak always occurred in May ( Fig 2). In 2010, 2012, and 2014, there were sharper increases in the number of cases during April to October, than in 2011, 2013, and 2015. Both severe and fatal cases occurred mainly from April to June, whereas mild cases occurred throughout the entire year ( Fig 2).
